SELECT C.NO , C.RANK_CODE , CR.NAME AS RANK_NAME , C.STATUS_NO , CS.NAME AS STATUS_NAME , C.NAME , C.ADDRESS , C.PRESIDENT_NAME , C.PRESIDENT_PHONE , C.PRESIDENT_EMAIL , C.START_DATE , P.MANAGER_NAME , P.MANAGER_PHONE FROM CLIENT C LEFT JOIN CLIENT_RANK CR ON ( C.RANK_CODE = CR.NO ) LEFT JOIN CLIENT_STATUS CS ON ( C.STATUS_NO = CS.NO ) LEFT JOIN PROJECT P ON ( C.NO = P.CLIENT_NO ) WHERE C.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND ( C.NAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%' OR P.MANAGER_NAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%' OR P.MANAGER_PHONE LIKE '%${searchValue}%' )
AND C.NAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND P.MANAGER_NAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
AND P.MANAGER_PHONE LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
ORDER BY C.NO DESC
